English.Name: Razor Wind
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Gives the user the [LS:13618]Razor Wind[LE] status,
which causes the Pokemon to charge
power for 1 turn and then try a
powerful attack with a high critical-hit
rate on the next turn. You can't [LS:13762]link[LE]
this move.
